fileInput.invalid: Invalid JSON file. Please choose another file.

hoverTip: Hover on options below to gather more information.

enableUpdateSkull.label: Enable updating skulls
enableUpdateSkull.tip: We don't advise to enable this because of performance issues.

enableLocalProfileCache.label: Enable cache of local profiles
enableLocalProfileCache.tip: This will allow you to use cached skins even without network, but we don't advise to enable this if you're using a stable network.

enableCacheAutoClean.label: Clean cache when loading CustomSkinLoader
enableCacheAutoClean.tip: It won't be cleaned if caching local profiles is enabled.

forceLoadAllTextures.label: Force to load skin and cape even they come from different skin servers
forceLoadAllTextures.tip: If disabled, once CustomSkinLoader can load any textures, it will stop continuing loading. We don't advise to enable this.

cacheExpiry.label: Cache expires after
cacheExpiry.help: It shouldn't be too low or too high. Setting it to 0 will disable cache.

threadPoolSize.label: Thread pool size of loading skins and skulls
threadPoolSize.help: It can be increased when entering a server which has many players, but it should't be too high.

dragTip: To re-order items, drag and drop each item.
name: Name

mojang.sessionRoot: Yggdrasil API session server URL. Optional.

legacyApi.checkPNG: Check if file is valid PNG.
